    Setting Up Virtual Machine Using VirtualBox
    Posted on December 30, 2017 by Kartik B.

    VirtualBox allows you to run more than one operating system at a time. This way, you can run software written for one operating system on another (for example, Windows software on Linux or a Mac) without having to reboot to use it. Since you can configure what kinds of “virtual” hardware should be presented to… Read more »
